summary: The Violent Antisemitism Threat Assessment Act (H.R. 5011) mandates the Secretary of Defense to submit a report to relevant congressional committees by March 20, 2026. This report must analyze the threat posed by violent antisemitism as a component of transnational extremist movements. The report should include an overview of antisemitic ideologies, a review of related violence and propaganda, and an assessment of the threat to the United States and its interests.
